Birthday

190 Happy Birthday Wishes For Friends, Family, And Everyone In Between

Here are the best birthday quotes, funny jokes, and best wishes for all the special people in your life. And best wishes for all the special people in your life.

Аделина А.А. Автор
|
Обновлено 9 августа, 2023
В этой статье

В статье:

  • Happy Birthday Wishes
  • 2 секция
  • Happy Birthday Son
  • Romantic Birthday Messages
  • Quotes For A Birthday Celebration
  • Text Message And Facebook Birthday Wishes
  • Happy Birthday Wishes
  • 2 секция
  • Happy Birthday Son
  • Romantic Birthday Messages
  • Quotes For A Birthday Celebration
  • Text Message And Facebook Birthday Wishes
Показать еще

When a friend or family member has a birthday, we want the perfect thing to write on the birthday card to make them feel special. Birthday wishes can go a long way toward helping a loved one know how you think about them by making them feel important and loved. Our collection of birthday messages ranges from funny to profound and lighthearted to an expression of love. You're sure to find the right words to express what you want to say. Whether in a text message or a sweet poem, the best birthday wishes strike just the right note.

Здесь будет реклама

When a friend or family member has a birthday, we want the perfect thing to write on the birthday card to make them feel special. Birthday wishes can go a long way toward helping a loved one know how you think about them by making them feel important and loved. Our collection of birthday messages ranges from funny to profound and lighthearted.

Happy Birthday Wishes For All Of Us

  • Happy Birthday! Another year, and you're just getting sweeter.
  • You look ageless, grow wiser and get more fun every year. Happy birthday.
  • It's your special day—the day you get a free dessert at a restaurant in exchange for being stared at by everyone in the place!
  • Remember, you get a birthday WEEK, not just one day. But today's extra special, and I hope you're showered with gifts, attention, and cake!

Funny Birthday Wishes, Puns, and Jokes

  • Happy Birthday! Another year, and you're just getting sweeter.
  • You look ageless, grow wiser and get more fun every year. Happy birthday.
  • Q: It's your special day—the day you get a free dessert at a restaurant in exchange for being stared at by everyone in the place!
  • Q: Remember, you get a birthday WEEK, not just one day. But today's extra special, and I hope you're showered with gifts, attention, and cake!

Birthday Wishes For Your Closest Friends
